me chithrapataya godak parana hindi chithrapatayak.meka chithrapataya thiragatha wune 1994 warshayeyi.mehi wu ek upa pradhana charithayak karanne boliwudaye raju sharuk kan.ohuge labala wiye di ohu sidukarapu me ranganaya thamath sharukge rasikayange hith walin makila gihin na.aththatama me chithrapataya parana hindi bayiskop pissan wenuwenmayi ada thilina karanne.

eeye pawathi jameyika - dakunu api්raka athara tharagayen jameyikawa lakunu 72-45kin jaya wartha kaleya.eyata amatharawa loka netbol sura ostreliyawa ha samowa athara tharagayen lakunu 81-23ka jayak ostreliyanu pilatada, trinidad tubago ha wels athara tharagayen lakunu 51-48ka jayaka trinidad tubago pilatada, nawasilanthaya ha piji athara tharagayen 80-25 jayak nawasilanthaya pilatada himi wiya.shri lankawa ha malesiyawa aasiyawe palamu ha dewani kandayam wima hethuwen tharagawaliyata ekwa sitina athara singappuruwa sathkarakathwaya labime hethuwen tharagawaliyata sudusukam labuweya.ema ratawalata amatharawa ostreliyawa, nawasilanthaya, jameyika, engalanthaya, malawi, trinidad tubago, wels, babados, uthuru ayarlanthaya, piji, samowa, botswana ha dakunu api්rakawa loka netbol kirula wenuwen dan satan wadithi.me tharaga sancharaya sadaha krida amathyanshaye anugrahaya himiwa atha.wasara 2012 di pawathwimata niyamitha aasiyanu netbol surathawaliye sathkarakathwaya shri lankawata pirinamimata eeye pawathi jagath netbol kongras samuewedi thiranaya wiya.aasiyanu netbol surathawak 2001di shi්ra lankawedi meyata pera pawath wiya.pasugiya aasiyanu netbol surathawa shri lankawa dina ganimata samath wiya..

tiyulin jayarathnagen wadakayanta abhiyogayakgitha shrawakayinge hada bandi “naga salambaa” (malani bulathsinhala) - “punchi panthiwala sabama surathal” (ti. em. jayarathna) - “punchi kale api” (bandula wijewira) - “thangamani” (fredi silwa) saha “kolikuttu sahodarayo” (katun) wani githa desiyakata aasanna gananaka thanu nirmana himikaru wana tiyulin jayarathna apata sitina prathibhapurna prawina sangithagnyayeki.tharuna wiyedima shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe wadaka mandalaye samajikayeku washayen sewayata bandunu tiyulin wishrama yana wita wadaka mandalaye pradhaniya lesa katayuthu karamin siti athara me wana wita dashaka hatharakata wadi kalayak ohu siya saundarya charikawe niyuthuwa sitiyi.
